resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74206</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>74bca83a-099e-44ac-8fc0-649fb57c76cb#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Arlecchino, a komikusan gyáva cseléd</string>
            <string language="en">Arlecchino, the funnily coward servant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arlecchino, der funnily coward Bedienstete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arlecchino, l'domestique funnily lâche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arlecchino, empregado funnily coward</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arlecchino, il servo funnily codardo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Arlecchino, ο αστεία υπάλληλος δειλών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arlecchino, el criado funnily cobarde</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Arlecchino, a komikusan gyáva cseléd képe(Jelmeze mindig fehér, zölddel díszített bő ruházat, fehér bóbitás sapka, bőrőve, erszénye, cipője sárga, és fegyvere a tőr)</string>
            <string language="en">Portrait of Arlecchino, the funnily coward servant (His costume is always white, wide clothing decorated with green, white-capped cap, his leather belt, purse and shoes are yellow and his weapon is the dagger)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Arlecchino,  </string>
            <string language="en">Arlecchino</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Portrait von Arlecchino, der funnily coward 
Bedienstete (sein Kostüm ist immer die weiße, breite Kleidung, die 
mit grüner, weiß-mit einer Kappe bedeckter Schutzkappe, sein 
lederner Riemen verziert wird, sind Geldbeutel und Schuhe Gelb und 
seine Waffe ist der Dolch)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Verticale d'Arlecchino, l'domestique funnily 
lâche (son costume est toujours l'habillement blanc et large décoré
du chapeau vert et blanc-couvert, sa ceinture en cuir, la bourse et 
les chaussures sont jaune et son arme est le poignard)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrato de Arlecchino, empregado funnily coward 
(seu traje é sempre roupa branca, larga decorada com o tampão verde,
branco-tampado, sua correia de couro, a bolsa e as sapatas são 
amarelo e sua arma é o dagger)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ritratto di Arlecchino, il servo funnily 
codardo (il suo costume è sempre vestiti bianchi e larghi decorati 
con la protezione verde e bianco-ricoperta, la sua cinghia di cuoio, 
la borsa ed i pattini sono il colore giallo e la sua arma è il 
dagger)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πορτρέτο Arlecchino, ο αστεία υπάλληλος δειλών (το 
κοστούμι του είναι πάντα άσπρος, ευρύς ιματισμός που 
διακοσμείται με την πράσινη, άσπρος-καλυμμένη ΚΑΠ, η ζώνη 
δέρματος, το πορτοφόλι και τα παπούτσια του είναι κίτρινος και το
όπλο του είναι το στιλέτο)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Retrato de Arlecchino, el criado funnily cobarde 
(su traje es siempre ropa blanca, ancha adornada con el casquillo 
verde, blanco-capsulado, su correa de cuero, el monedero y los zapatos
son amarillo y su arma es la daga)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arlecchino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arlecchino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arlecchino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arlecchino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Arlecchino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arlecchino</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

            </role>

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>

          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
